Jekyll is Pretty Cool

16 Mar 2009

So I’m giving Jekyll a try, and it’s pretty cool. Right now, I’m using mojimbo’s stuff straight up, but hopefully soon I’ll get a chance to mess with all of this myself, and come up with something fairly original.
